TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: I have bad news, Avens. Yarrow says there was a problem with the proposed power source, so the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> won’t be asked to fire.
AVENS: I hope you’re pulling my locomotive limb here, Cassava.
CASSAVA: I wish I were, my friend, but no. They aren’t certain they can fix the problem, so the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> is on indefinite hiatus.
CASSAVA: Tell Privet and Mallow they should return from the <color=orange>cannon</color>. My spouse and I will remain at the <color=orange>Construction Yard</color>, for now.
AVENS: An update: Mallow and I will join you and Daz. Privet left to visit her brother. She fears Idaea may feel responsible.
